name: collectionbuilder2022-data
title: CollectionBuilder2022 Data
description: Metadata and data derived from CollectionBuilder2022. CollectionBuilder-GH is a template for creating small digital collection exhibits on GitHub Pages designed for teaching digital library skills

resources.title: CollectionBuilder2022 Metadata Facets
